languages.text: {n}Твердость руки подводит вас, и выстрел уходит мимо цели.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Рукоять нестабильна в вашей влажной руке — заряд летит чуть выше, чем вы ожидали, проделывая дымящуюся дыру в вашем роскошном диване.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The steadiness of your hand fails you, and the shot goes wide.{/n}

languages.text: {n}手元がぶれて、弾は的から大きく外れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The steadiness of your hand fails you, and the shot goes wide.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}手元がぶれて、弾は的から大きく外れた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elinin sabitliği seni yanıltıyor ve hedefi ıskalıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The steadiness of your hand fails you, and the shot goes wide.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elinin sabitliği seni yanıltıyor ve hedefi ıskalıyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu mano no consigue mantenerse firme y el disparo falla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The steadiness of your hand fails you, and the shot goes wide.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu mano no consigue mantenerse firme y el disparo falla.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的手摇摇晃晃，子弹未能击中目标。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The steadiness of your hand fails you, and the shot goes wide.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的手摇摇晃晃，子弹未能击中目标。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre main se met à trembler et le tir manque sa cible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The steadiness of your hand fails you, and the shot goes wide.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre main se met à trembler et le tir manque sa cible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Hand versagt dir den Dienst, und der Schuss geht weit daneben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The steadiness of your hand fails you, and the shot goes wide.{/n}
